name: Give us a Breack
description:
Made for FSU FALL 2020 Gamejam.

By Ross Hayao (Programmer), Chris Banks (3D Modeler), Justin Meyer (Level Designer), Will Sarazin (Sprite Artist).

CONTROLS:

1, 2, 3 - change character.

Space - character action.

Yellow - can pick up and push boxes.

Blue - can dash in the air.

Red - can summon a ladder to jump.
